title: Is Udemy good for learning data science? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, Udemy is best for learning data science from beginner to advanced level. There are more than 8000 paid and more than 500 free courses on data science available on udemy. If we talk about free course then i would suggest one course called “Introduction to Data Science using Python” by Rakesh gopalkrishnan with 2.5 hours of course around 50,000 plus enrollment. This course will help you to understand basics about DS.In paid category, there are 5 best seller courses which makes you expert in Data science “Machine Learning A-Z™: Hands-On Python & R In Data Science” by Kirill Eremenko with 41 hours of video content and having more than 4 lakh enrollment of student.“Python for Data Science and Machine Learning Bootcamp” by Jose portilla with 22.5 hours of video content and having more than 2 lakh enrollment on student.“The Data Science Course 2019: Complete Data Science Bootcamp” by 365 careers with 27 hours of video content and having more than 1 lakh enrollment of student.“Data Science A-Z™: Real-Life Data Science Exercises Included” by Kirill Eremenko with 21 hours of video content and having more than 1 lakh enrollment of student.“Tableau 10 A-Z: Hands-On Tableau Training For Data Science” by Kirill Eremenko with 7.5 hours of video content and having more than 90k enrollment of students.This is the list of best seller courses to learn data science at affordable cost. In case if you have budget then I suggest you to go for Simplilearn “Data scientist master program” this program consist of 7 courses in which you learn Data science with R-programming, SAS, Python, Tableau, Hadoop and Spark along with Capstone project where you can implement your learning practically. This program cost around Rs 50000, you can check other details on simplilearn official site. I know cost is too high but you will get more benefit after completing this program as you complete one project here which is not possible when you learn data science from Udemy. so best on your interest choose any of the platform. Hope this help

Udemy offers various short term Data Science Programs and these programs are pre-recorded programs wherein you can start off with self-paced training. These courses are best suited wherein if you want to know about Data Science, how it works. But if you want to change your career and want to go through rigorous training then these courses offered by Udemy are not the best option you get. There are various platforms that you can find wherein you can take up a Data Science training program, wherein you will get proper exposure through the training with lots of in-depth knowledge and project training. Platforms like Simplilearn, Edureka, Intellipaat, Learnbay provide Data Science training programs. Among these above-mentioned platforms, the one that I would recommend is Learnbay. They offer IBM Certified Data Science Programs and they have designed these courses especially for working professionals. The courses are designed in such a way wherein they can target the desired job roles. The Programs offered by Learnbay are: Data Science and AI Certification: This is for those with a job experience of 1 to 5 years. This course is aimed at all individuals who want to begin their technical careers as an ML programmer and data scientist. AI and ML Certification Program: This course is designed for the ones having more than 5+ years of work experience. This course is designed for the ones in the search for in-depth expertise in AI and ML. Data Science & AI for Managers and Leaders: This course is designed for the ones having 9+ years of work experience. With these many years of work experience, you must target for managerial roles.
